item.title: Introduction to International Economics
item.description: Instructor: Joseph Westenberg (jwesten@iu.edu) Office Hours: T 1:00 - 3:00 PM (or by appointment) in Wylie Hall 244 Class: T & Th 4:00 - 5:15 PM in Ballantine Hall 342 Prerequisites: Intro to Microeconomics (E201) OR Intro to Microeconomics: Honors (S201) Text: James Gerber’s “International Economics”, Seventh Edition Course Description This course provides a moderately in-depth look at some of the major topics in international economics that are quintessential for the economics major.
